characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. A motorcyclist is seen on the right side of the road, gradually moving ahead of the self-driving vehicle. The motorcyclist maintains a steady speed and does not pose any immediate threat.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position, keeping a safe distance from the motorcyclist on the right side. The vehicles speed remains steady throughout the segment.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving steadily ahead. 2) Front: A white sedan, approximately 30 meters away, maintaining its lane.
